episodeTitle: The Steam Whistle Forces Friends Apart! The Sea Train Starts to Run
episodeTitleJapanese: 仲間を引き離す汽笛！走り出す海列車
episodeTitleRomanized: Nakama o hikihanasu kiteki! Hashiridasu umi ressha
description: As CP9 prepares to depart Water 7 on the Puffing Tom sea train with Robin, Franky, and Usopp as captives, the scattered Straw Hat crew desperately races to reach Blue Station. Despite their efforts, Nami can only watch tearfully as the train departs for Enies Lobby.

events.title: Paulie Clears the Straw Hats' Name
events.description: Paulie tells the mob of workers and citizens that the Straw Hat Pirates are not responsible for the attack on Iceburg. He helps redirect their efforts to search for the scattered crew members, particularly Luffy and Zoro.
events.significance: This clears the Straw Hats' reputation in Water 7 and turns former enemies into allies who help search for the crew, demonstrating Paulie's integrity and the beginning of reconciliation between the Straw Hats and Galley-La Company.

events.title: Luffy Stuck Between Buildings
events.description: Luffy gets jammed between two buildings while trying to rush to the train station, unable to free himself despite his rubber body. This comedic moment shows the protagonist's predicament as time runs out.
events.significance: Provides comic relief while highlighting the desperate situation and Luffy's physical absence from the critical moment when the sea train departs.

events.title: Zoro Face-Plants into a Chimney
events.description: While leaping across rooftops trying to reach the station, Zoro misses his footing and faceplants directly into a chimney, getting stuck. This demonstrates his notorious poor sense of direction even in urgent situations.
events.significance: Classic Zoro moment showcasing his directional difficulties, adding humor while also preventing him from reaching Robin in time.

events.title: Chopper's Whispered Plea for Usopp
events.description: While leading a search party calling out for Luffy and Zoro, Chopper quietly whispers 'please come back, Usopp!' The accompanying soldiers copy him exactly, creating an absurd and touching moment.
events.significance: Shows Chopper's emotional state regarding Usopp's departure from the crew while providing comic relief. Demonstrates his longing for his friend despite the crew's conflict.

quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Whispered quietly while searching for Luffy and Zoro

events.title: Iceburg Reveals Sea Train Departure Details
events.description: Iceburg informs Nami and Chopper that the Sea Train is departing at eleven o'clock, that CP9 and Robin will be on it, and that it's bound for Enies Lobby. He explains he has no power over it since it's currently being run by the World Government.
events.significance: Provides crucial information about Robin's destination and the timeline the Straw Hats must work against. Establishes Enies Lobby as the next major location and reveals the World Government's direct involvement.

events.title: CP9 Arrives at Blue Station
events.description: Rob Lucci leads CP9 to Blue Station with Blueno carrying the captured and bound Franky and Usopp in sacks. The agents prepare to board the Puffing Tom sea train to Enies Lobby with their captives.
events.significance: Critical moment showing CP9 successfully capturing both Franky and Usopp, and their imminent departure from Water 7. Sets up the rescue mission arc.

events.title: Robin Boards the Sea Train
events.description: Robin is escorted onto the Puffing Tom by Marine guards under CP9's supervision. Despite having the ability to easily overpower her guards, she complies without resistance, continuing her self-sacrifice to protect the Straw Hats.
events.significance: Demonstrates Robin's resolve to sacrifice herself for the crew's safety. Sanji observes this and realizes she's choosing not to fight back, deepening the emotional stakes of her capture.

events.title: Sanji Decides to Board the Sea Train Alone
events.description: Hidden near Blue Station, Sanji watches Robin board the train and CP9 arrive with Franky and Usopp. Realizing he can't wait for the others, he makes the critical decision to secretly board the Puffing Tom alone to protect Robin and attempt a rescue.
events.significance: Sanji's solo infiltration mission begins, demonstrating his dedication to Robin and his willingness to face CP9 alone. This decision directly leads to the dramatic events on the sea train and eventually at Enies Lobby.

events.title: Franky and Usopp Beaten by Guards
events.description: After being thrown into the back of the sea train, Franky threatens the guards. Both he and Usopp are subsequently beaten up by the Marine guards aboard the train.
events.significance: Shows the helpless situation Franky and Usopp are in as captives, emphasizing the dire circumstances and the need for rescue.

events.title: Lucci Shows No Sentiment About Leaving Water 7
events.description: When informed about the sea train's early departure, Rob Lucci coldly states he has no feelings about leaving Water 7 after working undercover there for many years, demonstrating his ruthless professionalism.
events.significance: Reveals Lucci's cold, emotionless nature and his complete dedication to his mission over any personal connections. Contrasts sharply with the Straw Hats' emotional bonds.

events.title: Lucci's Arrogant Treatment of Kalifa
events.description: When Kalifa apologizes unnecessarily after Lucci corrects her about the mission not being complete until they reach Enies Lobby, Lucci dismisses her in an arrogant manner, showing his superiority complex even toward fellow CP9 members.
events.significance: Further establishes Lucci's personality as cold and superior, even to his own teammates. Shows the hierarchy and dynamics within CP9.

events.title: The Puffing Tom Departs for Enies Lobby
events.description: The sea train's whistle blows and the Puffing Tom begins its journey from Water 7 to Enies Lobby, carrying Robin, Franky, Usopp, CP9, and the secretly-boarded Sanji. Nami arrives just in time to see the train leaving.
events.significance: The critical turning point of the arc - Robin is now en route to the World Government's judicial island. This moment triggers the entire Enies Lobby rescue mission and is one of the most emotionally significant moments in the Water 7 saga.

events.title: Nami Tearfully Calls Out to Robin
events.description: Arriving too late at Blue Station, Nami tearfully calls out to Robin as the sea train disappears from sight, unable to stop her friend from being taken away by CP9 to Enies Lobby.
events.significance: One of the most emotional moments of the arc, crystallizing the crew's failure to prevent Robin's capture and their desperation to save her. This moment galvanizes the crew's resolve to mount a rescue mission to Enies Lobby.

quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Whispered quietly while searching for Luffy and Zoro

themes.description: Robin's continued self-sacrifice to protect the Straw Hats is central to this episode, as she allows herself to be taken without resistance despite having the power to fight back.
themes.symbolism: The departing sea train represents the separation forced upon the crew and Robin's willingness to face her fate alone to save her friends.

themes.description: The episode emphasizes the crew's desperate but ultimately futile attempts to reach Robin in time, with Luffy and Zoro physically trapped and Nami arriving just moments too late.
themes.symbolism: The steam whistle that 'forces friends apart' symbolizes the cruel timing and circumstances that separate the crew from Robin.

themes.description: Despite the setback, Sanji's decision to board the train alone demonstrates the crew's unwavering determination to save Robin, setting up the rescue mission to come.
themes.symbolism: Sanji boarding the train represents the crew's refusal to give up on their nakama, no matter the odds.

characterSpotlights.development: Nami's desperate race to the station and tearful reaction to missing Robin demonstrates her deep bond with her crewmate and her helplessness in this situation.
keyActions: Rushes to Blue Station after learning from Iceburg about the train's departure
Arrives just as the train is leaving
Tearfully calls out to Robin as the train disappears

characterSpotlights.development: Sanji's observation of Robin's situation and his decision to board the train alone showcases his dedication to protecting the women he cares about and his tactical thinking.
keyActions: Observes Robin boarding the train and notices she's not resisting
Watches CP9 arrive with Franky and Usopp
Makes the critical decision to secretly board the Puffing Tom alone

characterSpotlights.development: Robin's passive acceptance of her capture, despite having the power to resist, reinforces her self-sacrificing nature and the weight of her decision to leave the crew.
keyActions: Allows herself to be escorted onto the sea train without resistance
Boards the Puffing Tom bound for Enies Lobby

characterSpotlights.development: Chopper's leadership of the search party combined with his whispered plea for Usopp shows his emotional struggle with the crew's current fractured state.
keyActions: Leads search party for Luffy and Zoro
Quietly whispers for Usopp to come back

characterSpotlights.development: Lucci's emotionless departure from Water 7 after years undercover demonstrates his complete professionalism and lack of sentiment, marking him as a formidable villain.
keyActions: States he has no feelings about leaving Water 7

mangaDifferences.difference: Episode 252 adapts portions of Chapter 360 and Chapter 361, covering the crew's failed attempts to reach the sea train and its eventual departure.

trivia.fact: This episode marks the beginning of the sea train journey that will lead directly into the Enies Lobby arc, one of the most acclaimed arcs in One Piece.
The ending song 'Dear Friends' by TRIPLANE is entirely dedicated to the Going Merry and would later be used again during the ship's funeral in Episode 312.
The opening 'Kokoro no Chizu' was the first One Piece opening to be aired in widescreen format and the first to lack any opening narration.

sources.title: Kokoro no Chizu - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: Blue Station becomes very crowded when Aqua Laguna approaches, as many Water 7 citizens board up their houses and evacuate to other islands via the sea train.
